plot: A young man finds a video camera and sees the footage of a couple's personal life, watching the footage, he realizes it is much more than he expected and forces him to make a decision.
title: Bajo el Cielo
plot_es: A young man finds a video camera and sees the footage of a couple's personal life, watching the footage, he realizes it is much more than he expected and forces him to make a decision.
plot_en: A young man finds a video camera and sees the footage of a couple's personal life, watching the footage, he realizes it is much more than he expected and forces him to make a decision.
